arduinoLight.arduino.amblone

Class AmbloneTransmission

  • java.lang.Object
    • arduinoLight.arduino.amblone.AmbloneTransmission

  • public class AmbloneTransmission
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the periodic transmission of colors through a serial connection using the amblone protocol.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      void clearOutput(int port)
      Stops output on the specified port
      void setOutput(int port, IChannel channel) 
      void start(SerialConnection connection, int frequency)
      This method expects an already opened connection.
      SerialConnection stopTransmission()
      This method stops the transission and returns the connection that was passed in with 'start(...)'.

    • Method Detail

      • setOutput

        public void setOutput(int port,
             IChannel channel)
        Parameters:
        port - an integer specifying an output port. 0 <= port < 4
        channel - a channel that should be mapped to this output.

      • clearOutput

        public void clearOutput(int port)
        Stops output on the specified port

      • start

        public void start(SerialConnection connection,
         int frequency)
        This method expects an already opened connection. Configuring a SerialConnection is not the purpose of this class.
        Parameters:
        connection - an open connection
        frequency - the amount of refreshes per second (Hz)

      • stopTransmission

        public SerialConnection stopTransmission()
        This method stops the transission and returns the connection that was passed in with 'start(...)'.
